Body:
re_pats = dtutils.compile_patterns(patterns, ignorecase)
assert dtutils.elem_is_matched(root, elem, re_pats) == rval
pytest.mark.parametrize(('root', 'elem', 'patterns', 'ignorecase', 'rval'),
    [('//remote/', '//remote/a', ['a'], False, True), ('C:/', 'C:/test/a',
    ['a'], False, False), ('C:/', 'C:/test/a', ['test/a'], False, True), (
    'C:/', 'C:/test/A', ['test/a'], False, False), ('C:/', 'C:/test/A', [
    'test/a'], True, True), ('C:/', 'C:/test/A', [], True, False)])
